ygData.subject: Re: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you look at the new Necro spellls, they all make the necro more group friendly.  I think it s entirely possible that these ideas and changes have been
ygData.messageBody:
> To be completely cynical for a minute, I'd argue that the only way to
> get results from Verant is to be a whiny brat. At least that's the
> impression I'm getting from the recent necro nerf. Can you name one
> other class that Verant has taken something away from then give 6 new
> spells or abilities to to compensate? No one could possibly claim that
> the necros presented their case in an adult manner.

If you look at the new Necro spellls, they all make the necro more group
friendly. I think it's entirely possible that these ideas and changes have
been in the works for awhile now. The pet changes came rather fast.. I
don't think they really had the time to make all these spells changes in
that short of a span. Look how long it is taking to get our missing songs.
:) I think in most cases, Verant does things that are on THEIR agenda, not
based on the whiney posts. Sometimes the two coincide...

Bad Verant! for the positive reinforcement!

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
